articles.description: The OG video doorbell for only $55 is wild
articles.content: Ring has become synonymous with video doorbells so much that more often than not, whether somebody has one or not, people call the doorbell a Ring. So, when I saw this Cyber Monday deal on one of the… [+1041 chars]
